name: Bicycle Typhoon Racing
description:
Become a professional bike rider with this crazy BMX bicycle racing game that puts you in impossible race tracks giving the feeling of cycling in olympic trails. Take control of your crazy bicycle rider, perform extreme bike stunts and reach the finish line before your rivals and become the professional master of mountain bike tracks.

You have the chance to master extreme 3D trails by winning every race against your rivals and claim the title of Bicycle Typhoon Racing Champion of 2017.

FEATURES:
• 3D Simulated Bicycle Racing
• Responsive and Easy Bike Controls
• Thrilling and Challenging Race Tracks
• Different Colors for your Bicycle
• Real-Like Bicycle Physics
• Breathtaking HD Graphics
• Free forever
• Adventurous music and sound effects
• No In App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:
- OXO 3D Studio Website: http://oxoapps.com
- Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/oxo3d
- OXO 3D Studio on Twitter: @Oxo3d

WE LOVE TO HEAR:

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
* This is free game especially for Sports, Racing and Simulation lovers but it contains third party ads
